Peju Ogunmola bụ onye omere ihe nkiri Yoruba nke na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood nke Yoruba
Nna ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ochie bụ Kola Ogunmola
Ọ bụ nwunye Sunday Omobolanle, onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị, onye na-ede egwuregwu, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, na onye mmepụta ihe
Ọ bụ nne nnochi anya Sunkanmi Omobolanle bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
